name: cave explorer (TortoiseShell)
description:
cave explorer

is small indie game made during blackthornprod game jam 2021.

Theme

Theme of this game jam is: less is more, and my interpretation is: sometime is better to be small then huge.

Input

A D >>> left/right

Space >>> jump

left shift >>> pause menu

issue The control sometimes stops working for unknown reasons. If this happens, try reloading the page (F5). I'm sorry but I can't fix it in time. Info  The game is created by one person. All assets were created during this game jam.
